accommodation.name: Flashpackers Ongarue
accommodation.description: Our accommodation is at Ongarue the start of The Timber Trail. It consists of 3 bedrooms. 2 of the bedrooms have a queen-sized bed,and 1 bedroom has 2 king singles.

accommodation.name: Raetihi Holiday Park
accommodation.description: Perfectly located in the Central North Island. We offer affordable accommodation, with communal facilities. We can help you book your canoe adventure on the Whanganui River, mountain bike shuttle and hire, and help you arrange your Ski Holiday.

accommodation.name: The Old Courthouse B&B
accommodation.description: The Old Courthouse B&B is a historically rich and welcoming place to stay and is the perfect place to make your base for your next skiing trip, kayaking, Hiking, Mountain Biking or any other adventure in the Ruapehu District.

accommodation.name: Taylor Lodge
accommodation.description: A secluded accommodation, located off SH4 between Ohakune and National Park. Surrounded by nature it’s an ideal spot for all your outdoor adventures. Whether it be hitting the ski fields, cruising on the mountain bike, or hiking the trails.

accommodation.name: Snowy Waters Lodge
accommodation.description: On the doorstep of Tongariro & Whanganui National Parks, Snowy Waters is a renovated Nurses Home with tonnes of character set within 5 acres of parklike grounds.

accommodation.name: Pipers Lodge
accommodation.description: Pipers Lodge offers clean and safe Tongariro Crossing accommodation for summer adventure and winter skiing on Mt Ruapehu.

accommodation.name: YHA Ohakune
accommodation.description: YHA Ohakune's historic building has been lovingly restored yet retains its unique and charming character. Perfectly positioned to explore Tongariro National Park and still enjoy the charming township.

accommodation.name: Awatea Chalet
accommodation.description: This property has all amenities necessary for a great mountain getaway with open fireplace, well appointed kitchen, large drying room for gear and a second mezzanine lounge for kids TV watching.

accommodation.name: Gondwana Lodge
accommodation.description: All year round Gondwana Lodge offers stylish accommodation for up to 10 guests in Ohakune's dress circle, within walking distance of the Junction. The setting is picturesque amongst beautiful trees, an abundance of birdsong and views of Mt Ruapehu.

accommodation.name: Tongariro Suites @ The Rocks
accommodation.description: Located on the edge of Tongariro National Park, Tongariro Suites offers Premium Boutique Accommodation. Every one of our four suites has stunning Mt Ruapehu views. Opened in March 2014 we offer fresh and modern accommodation in the Ohakune region.

accommodation.name: Alexander Spa Motel
accommodation.description: Clean self contained motel units located in a quiet street of SH4 just 20 minutes from The Timber Trail. Close to restaurants and cafes.

accommodation.name: Kings Ohakune Accommodation
accommodation.description: Iconic and historic, Kings is a relaxing place to get away and enjoy great outdoor adventures. Open all year round with busier Winter and Summer. Kings has cosy en suite rooms, 2 spa pools, an onsite restaurant bar with great views of Mount Ruapehu

accommodation.name: Blue Duck Station
accommodation.description: Located in the Ruapehu district on the banks of the Whanganui and Retaruke rivers and surrounded by Whanganui National Park, Blue Duck Station is an outdoor enthusiast's playground.

accommodation.name: Parkview Apartments
accommodation.description: Featuring panoramic views of Tongariro National Park from floor-to-ceiling windows, Parkview Apartments offers a modern, self-catering holiday home with a fully-equipped kitchen & laundry. Free Wi-Fi access is available throughout the house.

accommodation.name: Alexander Spa Motel
accommodation.description: Clean self contained motel units located in a quiet street off SH4 50 minutes from Whakapapa

accommodation.name: Bookabach
accommodation.description: Book your home away from home with Bookabach

accommodation.name: The Hobbit Motorlodge
accommodation.description: Quality accommodation in peaceful surroundings. We offer self contained and serviced accommodation with facilities rich in warmth and character and that special touch that makes you feel at home.

accommodation.name: Ohakune TOP 10 Holiday Park
accommodation.description: Ohakune is a perfect base from which to discover the Central North Island with Mt. Ruapehu, Mt. Ngauruhoe and Mt. Tongariro.

accommodation.name: Adventure Motel
accommodation.description: Gillian and John welcome you to our area, we are happy to recommend and assist with planning your visit to the Mt Ruapehu or the Tongariro National Park. we have a small motel off the main highway in Tongariro National Park Village

accommodation.name: Alpine Motel Lodge
accommodation.description: The Alpine Motel & Backpackers Lodge is located right in the Ohakune town centre, just metres from the shops, bars and restaurants.

accommodation.name: Airbnb - Raetihi
accommodation.description: Stretch Out and Enjoy A Space Of Your Own

accommodation.name: Bachcare
accommodation.description: Book your home away from home with Bachcare

accommodation.name: Tussock Grove Boutique Hotel & Cottage
accommodation.description: Tussock Grove Boutique Hotel is the ideal place to stay in the Central North Island. It is situated in pleasant, park-like surroundings just 1km from Ohakune Township.

accommodation.name: Powderhorn Chateau Ohakune
accommodation.description: Combining all the facilities of a great hotel with the ambience of a friendly lodge.

accommodation.name: The Peaks Motor Inn
accommodation.description: If you are visiting Tongariro National Park, Tongariro Crossing and Mt Ruapehu, or Turoa Ski fields then Ohakune has everything you need, and the best accommodation in Ohakune is "The Peaks Motor Inn".

accommodation.name: Cairnbrae House
accommodation.description: Homelike tranquility with guests privacy and comfort in mind. Breakfast included. Free off road parking. Free Wifi.

accommodation.name: Ranfurly Cottage
accommodation.description: Ranfurly Cottage is a boutique B&B situated on the edge of historic Raeithi Village looking towards Ruapehu's stunning volcanic peak, Tongariro National Park and a stones throw from the Whanganui River.

accommodation.name: Flashpackers Ongarue
accommodation.description: Flashpackers cater for all the needs to make your adventure become real. Cycling adventure,between Pureora and Ongarue provides 85km of cycling pleasure through magnificent native forest,across deep gorges (all bridged) and the Ongarue Spiral.

accommodation.name: Mountain Max's
accommodation.description: Perfect for groups, Mountain Max's is a 4 bedroom 2 bathroom Erua dwelling plus a 3 bedroom cottage in the historic mill town of Erua, adjacent to the Tongariro National Park.

accommodation.name: Station Chalets
accommodation.description: Station Lodge offers three self-contained private stand alone Luxury Chalets, complete with private spa pool.

accommodation.name: The Park Hotel Ruapehu
accommodation.description: The Park Hotel Ruapehu. An ideal base for the Tongariro Alpine Crossing. The Park Hotel offers the biggest variety of accommodation in National Park.

accommodation.name: Howard's Mountain Lodge
accommodation.description: Howards Mountain Lodge is one of National Parks most iconic accommodation providers.  With our proximity to the Tongariro National Park and Ruapehu ski facilities, we can cater for all recreational guests.   Hiking and Biking in summer, skiing winter

accommodation.name: The River Lodge B & B
accommodation.description: With breathtaking views of Mount Ruapehu and set in world heritage national parks, join us at The River Lodge and experience the essence of this unique location in comfort and style.

accommodation.name: Youthtown Ohakune Lodge
accommodation.description: Youthtown Lodge is the ideal accommodation for any season! The lodge is warm and spacious, has a large cosy lounge with plenty of seating and open fire.

accommodation.name: LKNZ Lodge
accommodation.description: Welcome to Ohakune. LKNZ lodge and backpackers is located in the heart of the township of Ohakune.

accommodation.name: The Crossing Backpackers
accommodation.description: We have budget accommodation with a variety of room types to suit family, friends and individuals alike.

accommodation.name: Night Sky Cottage
accommodation.description: Night Sky Cottage is designed to offer a true 5-star, eco-focussed, New Zealand protected native bush experience. The cottage is set in 1-ha of protected native Manuka and Beech Tree bush and is accessible via a 50 meter boardwalk.

accommodation.name: Blackfern Lodge
accommodation.description: Luxury rustic accommodation, a unique one stop experience amidst the warmth & wonders of New Zealand's Natural Beauty & History. Timber Trail Packages - All inclusive options available.

accommodation.name: St.Davids Ruapehu BnB
accommodation.description: St.Davids Ruapehu BnB is 2kms from Taumarunui city centre. Our BnB is a re furbished church, very spacious and situated in a quiet, peaceful location. My wife and I take pride in providing our guests with clean & comfortable accommodation.

accommodation.name: The Glade Accommodation, Taumarunui
accommodation.description: A private, quiet, country setting situated above the Wanganui River and overlooking the township of Taumarunui is The Glade Accommodation. Accommodating from 1 -12 guests, its ideal for everyone!

accommodation.name: Chateau Tongariro Hotel
accommodation.description: Chateau Tongariro Hotel believe in providing visitors with a timeless elegance and believe in preserving history and tradition.

accommodation.name: Snowy Waters Lodge
accommodation.description: On the doorstep of Tongariro & Whanganui National Parks, Snowy Waters is a renovated Nurses Home with tonnes of character set within 5 acres of parklike grounds.

accommodation.name: Ohakune Court Motel
accommodation.description: Situated in a quiet, secure location Ohakune Court Motel is within walking distance to the town centre and the ideal choice if you want to explore the wider Waiouru, Tongariro National Park.

accommodation.name: Station Lodge - YHA OHAKUNE
accommodation.description: You are spoiled for choice when you visit Station Lodge in Ohakune, offering outdoor enthusiasts an all year playground of activities and adventures. Come and join us!

accommodation.name: Fernleaf Farm
accommodation.description: Beautiful peaceful country setting. Close to Tongariro National park

accommodation.name: Ruapehu Country Lodge
accommodation.description: Ruapehu Country Lodge offers boutique, quality, bed and breakfast accommodation in the heart of North Islands outdoor adventure playground.

accommodation.name: Adventure Lodge & Motel
accommodation.description: Situated in a quiet location off the main highway in National Park Village, Adventure Lodge and Motel offers free Wi-Fi access.

accommodation.name: Manuka Lodge
accommodation.description: Perfectly located at the southern end of the Tongariro National Park, Manuka Lodge offers a tranquil haven nestled at the end of a quite cul-du-sac only a 10 minute walk away from the shops, bars and eateries of the bustling Ohakune Township.

accommodation.name: Pipers Lodge
accommodation.description: Pipers Lodge is a family owned and operated business designed to accommodate families,groups or individuals. We have an in-house bar and dining area for breakfasts and dinner. Ski hire,games room and 3 spa pools for your comfort.

accommodation.name: Bookabach Raetihi
accommodation.description: Book your home away from home with Bookabach in the historic town of Raetihi

accommodation.name: Camp Epic
accommodation.description: Located right on the Timber Trail near the half way mark. Camp Epic is a private fully-serviced campground located at Piropiro in Pureora Forest Park.

accommodation.name: Ruapehu Mountain Motel and Lodge
accommodation.description: Calling all who are looking to have some FUN IN THE SNOW. The Winter season is here! Are you looking for amazing, affordable accommodation for your ski trip to Mount Ruapehu region? We are situated in the ideal location of Ohakune NZ's mountain town.

accommodation.name: Timber Trail Lodge
accommodation.description: Deep in the centre of the North Island, right in the middle of nowhere, the Timber Trail Lodge is a very special place. It provides full service comfort to bike riders on the Timber Trail and other visitors to the wilderness of Pureora Forest Park.

accommodation.name: Tussock Grove Boutique Hotel
accommodation.description: Tussock Grove Boutique Hotel is the ideal place to stay in the Central North Island.  The Hotel features a large, welcoming lounge complete with log fire, as well as 8 comfortable, two-storey rooms, all with en-suite bathrooms, and tea/coffee making facilities

accommodation.name: The Hobbit Motorlodge
accommodation.description: The Hobbit Motorlodge is a charming, purpose built alpine lodge and motel complex.

accommodation.name: Plateau Lodge
accommodation.description: Located on the edge of a Dual World Heritage site - 'Tongariro National Park', is Plateau Lodge & Shuttles. We offer accommodation and the only Tongariro campsites right in the village. With a backdrop of the Tongariro volcanoes, our lodge covers a wide range of family friendly apartments, ensuite rooms and lodge rooms.

accommodation.name: Airbnb
accommodation.description: Stretch Out and Enjoy A Space Of Your Own

accommodation.name: Twin Oaks Lodge
accommodation.description: Twin Oaks Lodge is the perfect place for larger groups. The massive 180m2 of floor space includes 5 bedrooms, huge open plan lounge, kitchen & dining room, separate lounge/games room downstairs, purpose built drying room, 2 bathrooms, deck & carport.

accommodation.name: Mellonsfolly Ranch - Home of the Old West Town
accommodation.description: A timeless western experience where the Old West lives on. Dust off your cowboy hat, pull on your jeans and cowboy boots and strap on some gun leather to experience the Old West with us at Mellonsfolly Ranch.

accommodation.name: Stonethrow
accommodation.description: Stonethrow is literally right on the Whanganui riverbank in Piriaka , a close 10.5 kms south of Taumarunui. It is a comfortable modern studio apartment.

accommodation.name: Plateau Lodge
accommodation.description: Alpine style Lodge with apartments, Ensuites, lodge rooms and camping on the door step to the Dual Heritage Tongariro National Park. Daily shuttles to the Tongariro Alpine Crossing and Northern Circuit at 6am-7am-8am-9am-10am.

accommodation.name: Bachcare Raetihi
accommodation.description: Book your home away from home with Bachcare

accommodation.name: Chateau Tongariro Hotel
accommodation.description: Come and stay in timeless elegance

accommodation.name: The Ohakune Central Motel and Lodge
accommodation.description: The Ohakune Central Motel and Lodge is located in downtown Ohakune, just few minutes walk from the main bus stop, cafes, restaurants and supermarket.

accommodation.name: Discovery Lodge
accommodation.description: Hello, we would love to have you stay with us and experience the amazing piece of pure New Zealand wilderness that is Tongariro.

accommodation.name: Fernleaf B&B /Farmstay
accommodation.description: Midway Auckland /Wellington. Beautiful peaceful country setting. Close to Tongariro National park on a working (Romney 2000 sheep and 200 cattle) farm. Trout fishing in Whanganui & Whakakpapa rivers. Close to Forgotten highway & magic glowworm alley.

accommodation.name: Rimu Park Mountain Lodge
accommodation.description: Rimu Park Mountain Lodge is situated at the foothills of Mt Ruapehu, offering great access to the Tongaririo National Park for skiing, snowboarding, hiking, mountain biking & fishing. We are operational all year round.

accommodation.name: Uncle Bill's Cottage
accommodation.description: Uncle Bill's Cottage is a beautifully restored cottage, set beside the river and tucked away in a valley rich in history. It's the perfect place for relaxing with family or friends, and a fabulous base for skiing, tramping, jetboating or biking.

accommodation.name: YHA National Park
accommodation.description: YHA National Park hostel is the closest backpackers to the famous Tongariro Alpine Crossing, near New Zealand’s National Parks of Tongariro and Whanganui and dual World Heritage area.

accommodation.name: Two Rivers Ohakune
accommodation.description: Quiet location but only a 10 min stroll to town by road or riverside walk. Private, warm, double glazed rooms with en-suite shower room. Hydrotherapy spa, free WiFi, mountain views, drying room, storage shed, off street parking, continental breakfast

accommodation.name: Forgotten World Motel
accommodation.description: Taumarunui Situated in Taumarunui, the Forgotten World Motel is a perfect base for your Forgotten World Adventure and exploring the Ruapehu district.

accommodation.name: Rocky Mountain Chalets
accommodation.description: Ohakune’s luxurious and affordable chalet accommodation. Rocky Mountain Chalets is a premium alpine-style resort consisting of 42 beautifully appointed stand-alone chalets.

accommodation.name: BachOneNine
accommodation.description: Welcome to Bach One Nine, a stylish, self-contained holiday retreat in the heart of Ohakune. Bach One Nine offers comfortable, contemporary accommodation with a touch of Kiwiana. Relax in the cosy lounge and watch a DVD while the kids watch a movie.

accommodation.name: LKNZ Lodge & Backpackers
accommodation.description: LKNZ lodge situated right on the doorstep of the Tongariro National Park is located in the township of Ohakune, with supermarket, restaurants, bars and shops all within a 2 minute walk. LKNZ provides quality accommodation to suit all budgets.

accommodation.name: The Peaks Motor Inn
accommodation.description: The Peaks Motor Inn, motel accommodation in Ohakune near Mt Ruapehu, New Zealand. Ideal skiing & snowboarding accommodation right on the ski fields doorsteps.

accommodation.name: Tongariro Crossing Lodge
accommodation.description: Tongariro Crossing Lodge is a family-run lodge in National Park Village

accommodation.name: Omaka Lodge
accommodation.description: Situated only 7km from the friendly township of Taumarunui, down the incredible Forgotten World Highway, lies Omaka Lodge, a boutique bed & breakfast venue in the heart of New Zealand’s Forgotten World.

accommodation.name: Tongariro Holiday Park
accommodation.description: We are located between the start and finish points of the Tongariro Alpine Crossing, in the winter 26kms to the car park on the Whakapapa ski field. There is a range of accommodation from Fully Self Contained Units, Ensuite Cabins, Basic Cabins and camping sites for campervans and tents.

accommodation.name: Whakapapa Holiday Park
accommodation.description: Fully serviced campground in the heart of Tongariro National Park, set in beautiful native trees - powered sites, cabins, tent sites, backpacker beds and lodge.
